entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of rain showers after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
